ElementType.name: debugOutput
ElementType.description: An AJAX-enabled debug output panel. This is an expandable area for displaying the most important JSF values: (1) the components tree with properties and values of attributes, (2) Faces context variables, with properties, for all scopes, and (3) the content of the application log inside an expandable <iframe>, if the application log can be accessed by a URL defined as the context initialization parameter in the application's web.xml file for "com.exadel.vcp.LOGFILE".

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.

AttributeType.name: keepTransient
AttributeType.description: Flag for mark all child components to non-transient. If true, all children components will be set to non-transient state and keep in saved components tree. For output in self-renderer region all content ( By default, all content in <f:verbatim> tags and non-jsf elements in facelets, marked as transient - since, self-rendered ajax regions don't plain output for ajax processing ).

AttributeType.name: ajaxRendered
AttributeType.description: Define, must be ( or not ) content of this component will be included in AJAX response created by parent AJAX Container, even if not forced by reRender list of ajax action. ignored if component marked to output by Ajax action.

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Component binding.

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

ElementType.name: debugConsole
ElementType.description: An interactive debugging console that shows the AJAX request log and the session data

AttributeType.name: height
AttributeType.description: Height of console (currently in pixels only)

AttributeType.name: keepTransient
AttributeType.description: Flag for mark all child components to non-transient. If true, all children components will be set to non-transient state and keep in saved components tree. For output in self-renderer region all content ( By default, all content in <f:verbatim> tags and non-jsf elements in facelets, marked as transient - since, self-rendered ajax regions don't plain output for ajax processing ).

AttributeType.name: hotkey
AttributeType.description: Control-key to use for expanding and contracting the console (default: control-Y)

AttributeType.name: ajaxRendered
AttributeType.description: Define, must be ( or not ) content of this component will be included in AJAX response created by parent AJAX Container, even if not forced by reRender list of ajax action. ignored if component marked to output by Ajax action.

AttributeType.name: startup
AttributeType.description: Possible values are 'shown', 'minimized', and 'hidden'

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

AttributeType.name: logOnly
AttributeType.description: If true, only AJAX log pane is displayed. Otherwise session variables are displayed as well.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Component binding.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

ElementType.name: draggable
ElementType.description: "Draggable" zone of page. User can press mouse button on such content and drag it to any "dropzone".If it has a child facet of "dragShape" , its content will be initially hidden, and then appear as a custom "cursor" during dragging. "value" and values of children (<f:param>) will be encoded in a client script and sent by the "drop" component action as request parameters.It's encoded by the HTML <div> or other element depending on the value of the "tagName" attribute. The client ID or value of the "sid" attribute (if present)is encoded by the HTML "id" attribute.Also, it encodes all necessary JavaScript code for supporting drag operations.

AttributeType.name: handle
AttributeType.description: ID of "sensitive" component for dragging this item. Important! Don't use with a defined dragShape facet!

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

AttributeType.name: sid
AttributeType.description: EXACT value for encoded html 'id' attribute, instead of JSF client id generation.

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter.

AttributeType.name: layout
AttributeType.description: Defines visual layout of panel , can be "block" or "inline".

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.

AttributeType.name: constraint
AttributeType.description: Constraint for drag directions: horizontal, vertical, or both allowed (default).

AttributeType.name: dropTarget
AttributeType.description: ID (or comma-separated list of IDs) of drop zone elements that will accept this component. Important! To work correctly, the ID of the target must be defined by the "sid". attribute.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

AttributeType.name: zindex
AttributeType.description: Z-level for dragging.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

AttributeType.name: cursorClass
AttributeType.description: Space-separated list of CSS style classes to be applied to the drag shape before the drag operation is performed. This value must be passed through as a "class" attribute on generated markup.

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Component binding.

ElementType.name: dropzone
ElementType.description: The "target zone" for a drag operation. When a draggable element is moved and dropped onto the area of this component, it performs an AJAX request with a combination of parameters defined by a child <f:param> element and parameters defined in the draggable element. It will override any pre-existing drop zone parameters. During decoding: Behavior is the same as for <ajax:commandLink> or <ajax:support>. In additional, if request parameters contain special for "value" property of draggable component, , before process listeners it will be set to "dragValue" attribute of this component ( with conversion by 'converter' , if set ). This value can be used in action or actionListener methods by : component.getAttributes.get("dragValue") , reference to component - by binding or from FacesEvent.getComponent() in actionListener . During encoding: It's encoded by an HTML <div> or other element depending on value of "tagName" attribute. The client id or value of the "sid" attribute (if present) is encoded by an HTML "id" attribute. Also, encode all necessary JavaScript code for supporting drag operations.

AttributeType.name: hoverClass
AttributeType.description: Name of CSS class applied to this component, when an acceptable dragable element hovers over it. On the end of hover, style changes from this class will be rolled back.

AttributeType.name: actionListener
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at method acception an ActionEvent with return type void.

AttributeType.name: sid
AttributeType.description: EXACT value for encoded html 'id' attribute, instead of JSF client id generation.

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] ( in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent() ) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: targetId
AttributeType.description: Alias for reRender : Id['s] ( in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent() ) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: if true , after process validations phase skip updates of model beans an force render response. can be used for validate components input

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: f "true", update on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. if "false" ( default ) update all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: onkeypress
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a key was pressed and released.

AttributeType.name: ajaxSingle
AttributeType.description: if true , submit ONLY one field/link, instead of all form controls.

AttributeType.name: ondblclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button was double clicked.

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.

AttributeType.name: ondrop
AttributeType.description: Script expression performed when a dragable element is dropped on this.

AttributeType.name: accept
AttributeType.description: ID (or comma-separated list of IDs) of dragable elements that will be accepted by this component. Important! To work correctly, the IDs must have been defined by the "sid". attribute.

AttributeType.name: onmouseover
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer was moved onto.

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: The current value for this component.

AttributeType.name: action
AttributeType.description: MethodBinding pointing at the application action to be invoked, if this UIComponent is activated by the user, during the Apply Request Values or Invoke Application phase of the request processing lifecycle, depending on the value of the immediate property.

AttributeType.name: onkeyup
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a key was released.

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter. This converter must be same as on accepted Draggable components. It used for revert conversion from request parameter to 'dragValue' property of component ( setup before process action event )

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.

AttributeType.name: onclick
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button was clicked.

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID ( in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent() ) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: onmouseout
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer was moved away.

AttributeType.name: onkeydown
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a key was pressed down.

AttributeType.name: onmousedown
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button was pressed down.

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay ( in ms. ) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events ( key press, mouse move etc ).

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: True means, that the default ActionListener should be executed immediately (i.e. during Apply Request Values phase of the request processing lifecycle), rather than waiting until the Invoke Application phase.

AttributeType.name: onmouseup
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer button was released.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Component binding.

AttributeType.name: onmousemove
AttributeType.description: HTML: script expression; a pointer was moved within.

AttributeType.name: onhover
AttributeType.description: Script expression performed when a dragable element hovered over this.

ElementType.name: clicktodrop
ElementType.description: "Draggable" zone of page. User can press mouse button on such content and it'll be dropped automatically to the choosen "dropzone". If it has a child facet of "dragShape" , its content will be initially hidden, and then appear as a custom "cursor" during dragging. "value" and values of children (<f:param>) will be encoded in a client script and sent by the "drop" component action as request parameters. It's encoded by the HTML <div> or other element depending on the value of the "tagName" attribute. The client ID or value of the "sid" attribute (if present) is encoded by the HTML "id" attribute. Also, it encodes all necessary JavaScript code for supporting drag operations.

AttributeType.name: handle
AttributeType.description: ID of "sensitive" component for dragging this item. Important! Don't use with a defined dragShape facet!

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

AttributeType.name: sid
AttributeType.description: EXACT value for encoded html 'id' attribute, instead of JSF client id generation.

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter.

AttributeType.name: layout
AttributeType.description: Defines visual layout of panel , can be "block" or "inline".

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.

AttributeType.name: constraint
AttributeType.description: Constraint for drag directions: horizontal, vertical, or both allowed (default).

AttributeType.name: dropTarget
AttributeType.description: ID (or comma-separated list of IDs) of drop zone elements that will accept this component. Important! To work correctly, the ID of the target must be defined by the "sid". attribute.

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

AttributeType.name: zindex
AttributeType.description: Z-level for dragging.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

AttributeType.name: cursorClass
AttributeType.description: Space-separated list of CSS style classes to be applied to the drag shape before the drag operation is performed. This value must be passed through as a "class" attribute on generated markup.

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Component binding.

ElementType.name: suggestionBox
ElementType.description: This element adds "on-keypress" suggestions capabilites to any input text component (like <h:inputText>). It will create a pop-up window for a input field component pointed to by the "for" attribute. For an ordinary request, render a hidden HTML <div> element and the necessary JavaScript code. When input to the target field exceeds the "minChars" property (default is 1), perform an AJAX request with the value current entered. If the AJAX request is detected and the request parameters map contains the client ID of this component, call a method defined by suggestionAction, and use it to return a value as data for render table, same as <h:dataTable>. In this case, the component then works the same as an ordinary dataTable. The rendered table is inserted in the pop-up area and is used for suggestion prompts for input element. If a user clicks on such a table row, its text (or value defined by fetchValue) is inserted as the value of the input field.

AttributeType.name: width
AttributeType.description: Width of the pop-up window. It can be "auto" (calculated on the client-side) or a number for setting in pixels.

AttributeType.name: dir
AttributeType.description: Alternate textual description of the element rendered by this component.

AttributeType.name: id
AttributeType.description: Every component may have an unique id. Automatically created if omitted.

AttributeType.name: bypassUpdates
AttributeType.description: if true , after process validations phase skip updates of model beans an force render response. can be used for validate components input

AttributeType.name: popupClass
AttributeType.description: HTML CSS class attribute of element for pop-up suggestion content.

AttributeType.name: limitToList
AttributeType.description: f "true", update on client side ONLY elements from this 'reRender' property. if "false" ( default ) update all rendered by ajax region components.

AttributeType.name: style
AttributeType.description: CSS style(s) to be applied when this component is rendered.

AttributeType.name: for
AttributeType.description: id ( or full path of id's ) of target component, for which this element must provide support. if target component inside of same <code>NamingContainer</code> ( UIForm, UIData in base implementstions ) , can be simple value of "id" attribute. For other cases must include id's of <code>NamingContainer</code> components, separated by ':' . For search from root of components, must be started with ':' .

AttributeType.name: var
AttributeType.description: The request-scope attribute under which the data object for the current row will be exposed when iterating.

AttributeType.name: summary
AttributeType.description: This attribute provides a summary of the table's purpose and structure for user agents rendering to non-visual media such as speech and Braille.

AttributeType.name: rows
AttributeType.description: The number of rows to be displayed, or zero for all remaining rows in the table.

AttributeType.name: converter
AttributeType.description: Id of Converter to be used or reference to a Converter.

AttributeType.name: lang
AttributeType.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.

AttributeType.name: first
AttributeType.description: The zero-relative row number of the first row to be displayed.

AttributeType.name: cellspacing
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies how much space the user agent should leave between the table and the column on all four sides. The attribute also specifies the amount of space to leave between cells.

AttributeType.name: fetchValue
AttributeType.description: A value to set in the target input element on a choice suggestion that isn't shown in the suggestion table. It can be used for descriptive output comments for suggestions. If not set, all text in the suggestion row is set as a value.

AttributeType.name: entryClass
AttributeType.description: Name of the CSS class for a suggestion entry element (table row)

AttributeType.name: onselect
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call on select suggestion, after update value of target element.

AttributeType.name: binding
AttributeType.description: Component binding.

AttributeType.name: selfRendered
AttributeType.description: if true , force active Ajax region render response directly from ctored components tree, bypass page processing. Can be used for increase performanse. Also, must be set to 'true' inside iteration components, such as dataTable

AttributeType.name: cellpadding
AttributeType.description: This attribute specifies the amount of space between the border of the cell and its contents. If the value of this attribute is a pixel length, all four margins should be this distance from the contents. If the value of the attribute is a percentage length, the top and bottom margins should be equally separated from the content based on a percentage of the available vertical space, and the left and right margins should be equally separated from the content based on a percentage of the available horizontal space.

AttributeType.name: rowClasses
AttributeType.description: rowClasses

AttributeType.name: title
AttributeType.description: Advisory title information about markup elements generated for this component.

AttributeType.name: oncomplete
AttributeType.description: JavaScript code for call after request completed on client side

AttributeType.name: rules
AttributeType.description:
This attribute specifies which rules will appear between cells within a table. The rendering of rules is user agent dependent. Possible values:
* none: No rules. This is the default value. * groups: Rules will appear between row groups (see THEAD, TFOOT, and TBODY) and column groups (see COLGROUP and COL) only. * rows: Rules will appear between rows only. * cols: Rules will appear between columns only. * all: Rules will appear between all rows and columns.

AttributeType.name: popupStyle
AttributeType.description: HTML CSS style attribute of element for pop-up suggestion content.

AttributeType.name: suggestionAction
AttributeType.description: Method call expression to get a collection of suggestion data on request. It must have one parameter with a type of Suggestion event and must return any type allowed for <h:datatable>

AttributeType.name: rendered
AttributeType.description: If false, this component will not be rendered.

AttributeType.name: reRender
AttributeType.description: Id['s] ( in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent() ) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: targetId
AttributeType.description: Alias for reRender : Id['s] ( in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent() ) of components, rendered in case of AjaxRequest caused by this component. Can be single id, comma-separated list of Id's, or EL Expression with array or Collection

AttributeType.name: styleClass
AttributeType.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute.

AttributeType.name: height
AttributeType.description: Height of the pop-up window. It can be "auto" (calculated on the client-side), "nnn%" (width as percentage of target input field), or a number for setting in pixels.

AttributeType.name: align
AttributeType.description:
left|center|right [CI] Deprecated. This attribute specifies the position of the table with respect to the document. Permitted values:
* left: The table is to the left of the document. * center: The table is to the center of the document. * right: The table is to the right of the document.

AttributeType.name: selectedClass
AttributeType.description: Name of the CSS class for a selected suggestion entry element (table row)

AttributeType.name: border
AttributeType.description: This attributes specifies the width (in pixels only) of the frame around a table (see the Note below for more information about this attribute).

AttributeType.name: bgcolor
AttributeType.description:
Deprecated. This attribute sets the background color for the document body or table cells.
This attribute sets the background color of the canvas for the document body (the BODY element) or for tables (the TABLE, TR, TH, and TD elements). Additional attributes for specifying text color can be used with the BODY element.
This attribute has been deprecated in favor of style sheets for specifying background color information.

AttributeType.name: selectValueClass
AttributeType.description: Name of the CSS class for a hidden suggestion entry element (table cell).

AttributeType.name: value
AttributeType.description: Initial value to set when rendered for the first time.

AttributeType.name: frequency
AttributeType.description: Delay (in seconds) before activating the suggestion pop-up.

AttributeType.name: tokens
AttributeType.description: The list (or single value) of symbols which can be used for division chosen of suggestion pop-up values in a target element. After input of a symbol from the list suggestion pop-up it is caused again.

AttributeType.name: status
AttributeType.description: ID ( in format of call UIComopnent.findComponent() ) of Request status component.

AttributeType.name: requestDelay
AttributeType.description: Delay ( in ms. ) for send ajax request on JavaScript event. In conjunction with events queue can reduce number of requests on keyboard or mouse move events.

AttributeType.name: eventsQueue
AttributeType.description: Name of requests queue to avoid send next request before complete other from same event. Can be used to reduce number of requests of frequently events ( key press, mouse move etc ).

AttributeType.name: frame
AttributeType.description:
void|above|below|hsides|lhs|rhs|vsides|box|border [CI] This attribute specifies which sides of the frame surrounding a table will be visible. Possible values:
* void: No sides. This is the default value. * above: The top side only. * below: The bottom side only. * hsides: The top and bottom sides only. * vsides: The right and left sides only. * lhs: The left-hand side only. * rhs: The right-hand side only. * box: All four sides. * border: All four sides.

AttributeType.name: immediate
AttributeType.description: immediate

AttributeType.name: param
AttributeType.description: Name the HTTP request parameter with the value of input element token. If not set, it be will sent as an input element name. In this case, input will perform validation and update the value.

AttributeType.name: minChars
AttributeType.description: Minimal number of chars in input to activate suggestion pop-up.
